name: The Sounds That Roam At Night
name_original: The Sounds That Roam At Night
description:
The Sounds that Roam at Night tells the story of four different people around the world hearing mysterious sounds all at the same time. As the player takes on the role of these four witnesses, the game gets more eerie and mysterious. 

Switch between the four different characters with 1, 2, 3 and 4 on your keyboard.

Have fun!

Developed by Nils Mahn, Anne Zarnecke, Kolja Hubatsch, Moritz Ratajczak & Hannah Pollow
Supported (in Programming) by Jörg Sroka (Anarevian)
